page.title: 09A TYPICAL SUNDAY
page.content: The Wilshaw Family David,Sue,Claire and Tina.Claire is about 16 years old and Tina is about 14 years old.Sunday is a family day so they all stay at home except if something special is g_ oing on.Not much work is done except for some gardening and walking the dog. They have a cooked lunch at about 1 o'clock in the afternoon.Then maybe some reading or listening to music and in the winter they may watch some videos.In the summer they sometimes go out for the weekend in their caravan.David Wilshaw owns the garage in Welford.None of them go to church or Sunday school.Sometimes Sue will sit down and do a bit of knitting. by Rachael,Stacy and Charlotte.
